nodes.text: Corellian rum was a type of rum from the planet Corellia. The smuggler Owerto Naiucho claimed that he had gained one of his many scars after getting drunk on Corellian rum and then falling into a heated camping stove.

Corellian rum was first mentioned first mentioned in Aftermath, a canon 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig. It first appeared in Aftermath: Empire's End, a 2017 novel also written by Wendig. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Corellian rum debuted in the 1994 novel The Courtship of Princess Leia, written by Dave Wolverton.
